messages.content:
Hi gusmack1, thanks for contacting us.  We've received your message and appreciate you getting in touch!

If you would like to book a table, don't hesitate to get in touch with the restaurant at 01355-233-343.

We are located at 1 St James Ave, East Kilbride, Glasgow G74 5QD (https://goo.gl/maps/UhAVgnZr86gTWGwy9)

Our menu is available here - https://mekongrestaurants.com/menus

For any other queries, a member of our team will be in contact shortly!
1 St James Ave, East Kilbride, Glasgow G74 5QD would be great to have you

Hi gusmack1, thanks for contacting us.  We've received your message and appreciate you getting in touch!

Exclusive Foodie Invitation from Mekong Thai Restaurant! ðð

Hey,

Hope you're doing well!
We at Mekong Thai Restaurant, have been seriously impressed by your food journey on Instagram.

We'd LOVE to treat you to a mouthwatering meal at our Thai haven. You'll get to taste our amazing dishes and create some foodie magic with an Instagram Reel!

What to expect:
- Delicious Thai cuisine that'll blow your mind.
- A cozy, Thai-inspired atmosphere for the perfect shot.
- Super-friendly staff ready to make your visit unforgettable.

Just tag us (@mekong.restaurants) and use #MekongThaiExperience when you share your Reel. We can't wait to see your take on our dishes!

Ready for an epic food adventure? Let us know of your availability and lets get you booked in to make some foodie memories together. ð

Cheers,
Mekong Thai Restaurant
